pullrequest.title: Grant permission to optional Admin Identity upon metric creation.

content.raw:
thanks Ger. 
Minor / style: Could you please change the function definition so it looks like the error function above ? Eg. const sendSuccess = function(data, resourceName) ... 
I don't think you need 'r' parameter (similar to error function above). 
I usually see this format when defining inner functions.
After that I think this will be ready to go !
